mapper.select: select q.qnaNo, q.userNo, q.userName, q.qnaTxt, q.qnaRegDate, q.qnaFile, q.qnaFileOri, q.itemNo, i.itemImg, i.itemName from qna q, item i where q.itemNo = #{itemNo} and q.itemNo = i.itemNo limit ${limit}, 10
mapper.delete: delete from qna where qnaNo = #{qnaNo} and userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (userNo, itemNo, userName, qnaTxt, qnaFile, qnaFileOri) values ( #{userNo}, #{itemNo}, #{userName}, #{qnaTxt}, #{qnaFile}, #{qnaFileOri})
